QuestData.Title: A Gift For Old Hillpaw
QuestData.Description: Old Hillpaw has about a million chickens on his farm... but that's not what he REALLY loves.$b$bI saw. He collects blue feathers.$b$bI don't realy know where to get a blue feather around here, but I do know where to find some blue pearls!$b$bCheck the oysters in Cattail Lake to the northwest. I'm sure a blue pearl will look nice with his feather collection!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: That old guy sure likes chickens.
